ch0113_42_mikan/0101_0701_01_10:
Were you about to head to the academy,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0113_42_mikan/0101_0701_02_10:
Um... If it’s all right, would you like to go
together?
ch0113_42_mikan/7101_0701_01_10:
Even Gym Leaders still have many things we
have to study.
ch0113_42_mikan/7101_0701_02_10:
Although some of us have taken up teaching
at Pasio Academy...
ch0113_42_mikan/7101_0701_03_10:
I...don’t quite have the confidence for
that yet.
ch0113_42_mikan/7102_0701_01_10:
When a student or Pokémon at Pasio
Academy gets injured...
ch0113_42_mikan/7102_0701_02_10:
sometimes I act as Nurse Miriam’s assistant
and help heal them.
ch0113_42_mikan/7102_0701_03_10: I’ve learned a lot about medicine that way.
ch0113_42_mikan/7103_0701_01_10:
Whitney always seems to have fun in sports
classes.
ch0113_42_mikan/7103_0701_02_10:
But when she messes up or loses, she gets
frustrated and starts tearing up...
ch0113_42_mikan/7103_0701_03_10:
She must love sports as much as Pokémon
battles!
ch0113_42_mikan/7104_0701_01_10:
Erika teaches flower arrangement in Kanto,
so she’s a natural when it comes to teaching
at the academy.
ch0113_42_mikan/7104_0701_02_10:
But whenever we have classes together as
students...
ch0113_42_mikan/7104_0701_03_10:
she loosens up and becomes a bit of a
prankster!
ch0113_42_mikan/7105_0701_01_10:
Enjoying your time at Pasio Academy,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0113_42_mikan/7105_0701_02_10:
If you ever have any trouble, try talking to
teachers or friends.
ch0113_42_mikan/7105_0701_03_10:
And you can always talk to me, of course!
I promise I’ll do what I can.
ch0113_42_mikan/1701_0701_01_10:
Oh! I wanted to give you something,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0113_42_mikan/1701_0702_01_10: Try using it after class today.
ch0113_42_mikan/2501_0701_01_10: I’d love to take a class on Pokémon contests.
ch0113_42_mikan/2501_0701_02_10:
Knowledge gives me confidence, and with
confidence...
ch0113_42_mikan/2501_0701_03_10:
maybe I’ll...get the courage to perform on
an even bigger stage...
ch0113_42_mikan/2501_0702_01_10:
Huh? You want ME to teach a class on
Pokémon contests?!
ch0113_42_mikan/2501_0702_02_10:
N-no way! I couldn’t! I’m not qualified
to teach!
ch0113_42_mikan/2511_0701_01_10:
At Pasio Academy, I’ve been trying to take
classes on treating Pokémon illnesses and
injuries.
ch0113_42_mikan/2511_0701_02_10:
When I was in Johto, there was a really
effective medicine that healed a sick
Pokémon instantly.
ch0113_42_mikan/2511_0701_03_10:
So I thought maybe I should learn to make
medicine like that myself.
ch0113_42_mikan/2511_0702_01_10:
It seems medical treatments for different
Pokémon can vary a lot.
ch0113_42_mikan/2511_0702_02_10:
The machine at the Pokémon Center is
incredible. It can heal any kind of Pokémon!
ch0113_42_mikan/3001_0701_01_10:
I woke up so refreshed this morning! I
wonder if all the tough battling I did
yesterday had anything to do with it.
ch0113_42_mikan/3003_0701_01_10:
Soaking up some bright, warm sunshine
always puts my heart at ease.
ch0113_42_mikan/3005_0701_01_10:
They say that letting your Pokémon get lots
of sleep helps them grow faster. Sounds like
a good idea, don’t you think?
